addon.name: kodinerds.net Binary Addons for AML S905 based devices

extension.description: None of the addons are checkted against other projects then Odroid_C2. Use them, on other AML S905 based devices, at your own risk! We are not responsible for any damage or data loss!
extension.disclaimer: Some parts of this addons may not be legal in your country of residence - please check with your local laws before installing.
